phrases: If we see it, it will only be for a second.
In these trees, there is no way to foresee and evade its attacks!
Captain, let us switch to Maneuver Gear!
At this rate, it will catch up with us!
That is why we came to this forest!
To just let yourself be swayed by whatever you are feeling at the moment?
is to keep the brat from getting a single scratch on him.
Even if it costs our lives.
It was not to keep watch on me?
We keep going on our horses, got it?
And it is right on top of us...
If we do not help, they will be wiped out again!
If Squad Levi does not defeat it, who will?
And maybe we could have saved him!
Eren, eyes back on the road!
Are you telling me to look away?
To abandon my comrades and run?!
I do not understand why we are leaving them to die!
Or why he will not explain!
That is because the Captain decided the reason should not be explained.
You just do not understand because you are still green!
If you get it, then shut up and obey!
I can fight on my own.
Why am I relying on others?
I can just fight on my own.
You are only allowed to do that if your life is in danger.
If you want to, do it.
And it has nothing to do with his Titan power.
No matter what power you use to suppress him,
no matter what cage you put him in,
he will never submit to anyone.
I just want to slaughter the Titans.
Eren, the difference between your decision and ours is experience.
But you do not have to rely on that.
Or believe in the Survey Corps and me.
I can believe in my own abilities
or the choices of companions I trust.
But no one ever knows how it will turn out.
So choose for yourself whichever decision you will regret least.
I came up with a way that would only half-kill you.
I said I would only be able to stop you as a Titan if I killed you.
But this method would only badly wound you.
Of course, it relies on the squad's skill.
The idea is to cut you right out of the Titan's neck.
We would end up cutting the ends of your arms and legs off,
but they would just grow back like a lizard's...
I do not know how they grow back.
So you are saying you do not want there to be any danger or sacrifice?
The danger for us is that you might kill us.
But that does not mean that we cannot use him to investigate.
I can be in charge of planning this, right?
Eren, if there is something you do not understand,
It is well worth any risk to our lives.
When it is prepared, I will use the smoke round to notify you.
After that, any decisions are up to you.
This dried-up well could hold even a mindless Titan...
Since I sealed the wall, I have not tried to control the Titan.
If I lose control, Squad Levi might kill me this time...
Did he not see the signal?
His ability just is not that reliable.
We are calling it quits for now.
So your self-inflicted bite wounds on your hands are not healing, either?
If you cannot transform into a Titan,
our main goal of sealing Wall Maria is off the table.
Do not let it get you down, Eren.
Well, it just means you are more human than I thought.
Better than rushing into something and getting killed.
Are they okay with my being unable to turn into a Titan?
Smoke Rounds (1) Signal rounds fired by small handguns using gunpowder.
A small tube, with the round, is swapped out each time.
Smoke Rounds (2) The signal color changes per message: Red Titan sighted.
What is the meaning of this?!
Prove you are not our enemy, humanity's enemy!
I dare you to make a single move with that arm!
I will cut off your head!
No, you are the ones who should get back.
I said I do not understand.
You think we cannot kill you?
Please shut up for a second!
Without the skin, it is really damned hot!
Hey, do not you feel it is hot, Eren?
How does it feel where the right hand connects?
If I just pull out this hand...
I still wanted to investigate some things...
Until I saw that they were actually ready to kill me, I did not understand...
That they doubted me so much.
That is why I chose them.
People say you only truly become a full member of the Survey Corps
after making it back alive from a mission.
But whenever you fight the Titans, you never have enough information.
There are too many situations you just cannot anticipate, no matter what.
They have had to cultivate the ability to take quick action
and to make ruthless decisions by assuming the worse case scenario.
But that does not mean they have become heartless.
It is not like they felt nothing when they turned their swords on you.
Squad Leader Hanji wants to see you.
I was not sure what to tell the brass.
The right Titan hand Eren created was holding this.
Like this, between its index finger and thumb.
It is hard to imagine that was an accident...
the heat and pressure did not warp the spoon at all.
I was trying to pick it up...
That may explain why you could not transform earlier.
In each case, you had a clear goal before you transformed.
that your self-inflicted injury probably is not the sole trigger.
You may need some goal, as well.
It is true that when I turned into a Titan this time,
it was like when I blocked that cannon she will.
I turned into a Titan to pick up a spoon?
In other words, you did not deliberately change without permission?
I am amazed you can bite through, Eren.
This is a small price to pay.
Not that it makes a difference.
Keeping you under control is our job.
And there is nothing wrong with that.
You must be disappointed in our stupidity.
We are going to rely on you.
And we want you to rely on us.
It is impossible to outrun it...
If we keep running away, it will stomp us all flat!
but everyone chose to go on,
even if it meant abandoning our comrades.
Captain Levi has been looking forward this whole time.
And the rest of the squad
believe in him, and put all their trust in him.
I will believe in them, too...
Advance a bit farther, tether the horses,
You guys will be off on your own for a while.
Once you are a good distance away from the Titan, hide Eren.
This is the power of the Survey Corps!
Looks like it is stopped moving...
But you did well, leading it here.
Men in the rearguard squads died buying us the time we needed.
We could not have done it without them.
Thanks to them, we will be able to see who is inside this thing.
I hope they have not pissed themselves...
Erwin Smith's secret plan was to capture the Female Titan.
The aces of the Survey Corps try to reveal its true identity, but...
Erwin Smith 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls (4)
